summary: A comprehensive Python library for Ethereum Application Binary Interface (ABI) handling, offering parsing of Solidity type strings, encoding of Python values into ABI binary format, decoding of binary data back to native Python types, and a flexible registry for managing coder implementations with detailed exception handling.
business_intent: Enable developers to reliably serialize and deserialize data when interacting with Ethereum smart contracts, simplifying contract calls, event parsing, and data validation within Python applications.
